      • saveAnalysis

        private void saveAnalysis(java.lang.String characterAtPosA,
                          java.lang.String characterAtPosB,
                          java.lang.String characterAtPosC,
                          int characterPosition)
                   throws org.json.JSONException
        Save the bigrams in the analyzer
        Parameters:
        characterAtPosA - : The character at the position characterPosition
        characterAtPosB - : The character at the position characterPosition + 1
        characterAtPosC - : The character at the position characterPosition + 2
        characterPosition - : The position of the character characterAtPosA
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - : All the JSON exceptions
